title: Ep: 013 - Derek Preble - Cabinetmaker & Furniture Designer
description: In this episode of Architecture, Design & Photography we sit down with our good friend and very talented cabinetmaker Derek Preble. The conversation begins with how Derek first became interested in working with wood and how those early days shaped his path to becoming a cabinetmaker.
author: info@trentbell.com (Trent Bell)
content:encoded: In this episode of Architecture, Design & Photography we sit down with our good friend and very talented cabinetmaker Derek Preble. The conversation begins with how Derek first became interested in working with wood and how those early days shaped his path to becoming a cabinetmaker.
